snippet.title: Super Cassette Vision Game: Pole Position II (1985 Epoch)
snippet.description:
In the sequel to Pole Position, you are again driving an F1 racer in a timed qualifying run, trying to achieve the pole position. Then it is off to the race, in hopes of taking that top spot.

Please like this video and subscribe to my channel for more great retro content.

#RetroGames #RetroGaming #OldGames #ClassicGames
